Articles.Content:
Haiiii All ,My Name Is Isaac And I am From Los Angeles ,I dont have that much experience of the game but will be soon, I Want to continue without completing the tutorials and share every possible moments with all of you.
![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I Will be Making Groups AND Companies along with my friends, well my friends dont like to play this game but you guys can be my friend ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Just Reply and i'll know ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Omigosh, Mr. Newton, I am such a huge fan of your work!!!1!!

On a more professional note, welcome to the forums!
Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game.

Welcome! Enjoy the corny jokes you'll be getting because of your username. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) But forreal, we're a pretty great community here. You'll enjoy it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Haiiii All ,My Name Is Isaac And I am From Los Angeles ,I dont have that much experience of the game but will be soon, I Want to continue without completing the tutorials and share every possible moments with all of you.
> ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> I Will be Making Groups AND Companies along with my friends, well my friends dont like to play this game but you guys can be my friend ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> Just Reply and i'll know ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hello there nice to meet you! ^\_\_^

> 
> 
> 
> ...I Want to continue without completing the tutorials...
> 
> Welcome. As a new player I'd appreciate your comments on the 'Induction To Construction' guide linked in my signature. It doesn't tell you how to *do* anything (especially as I haven't written the 'construction and flight' bit yet) but gives you a guide to the interface, settings and what all the buildings are for.
Thanks All =) Thanks For The Guides And Welcomes ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
